locations.Fire Temple MQ Near Boss Chest:
(can_use(Hover_Boots) and
                    (can_use(Fire_Arrows) and three_heart_heat) or
                    (can_use(Dins_Fire) and three_heart_heat)) or
                (can_use(Bow) and
                    (can_use(Fire_Arrows) and three_heart_heat) or
                    (can_use(Dins_Fire) and three_heart_heat)) or
                (can_use(Hookshot) and
                    (can_use(Fire_Arrows) and three_heart_heat) or
                    (can_use(Dins_Fire) and
                        (can_use(Goron_Tunic) or
                        (can_live_dmg('placeholder') and damage_multiplier != 'quadruple' and three_heart_heat) or
                        (can_use(Bow) and three_heart_heat) or
                        (can_use(Longshot) and three_heart_heat))))

exits.Fire Boss Room:
can_use(Megaton_Hammer) and Boss_Key_Fire_Temple and 
                ((logic_fire_boss_door_jump and
                    (unknown_heart_heat and can_use(Dins_Fire)) or
                    (unknown_heart_heat and can_use(Fire_Arrows))) or
                (Hover_Boots and
                    (unknown_heart_heat and can_use(Dins_Fire)) or
                    (unknown_heart_heat and can_use(Fire_Arrows))) or
                (unknown_heart_heat and at('Fire Temple Upper', True)))

locations.Fire Temple MQ Boss Key Chest:
has_fire_source and (Bow or logic_fire_mq_bk_chest) and 
                Progressive_Hookshot
